job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: Senior Software Engineer : 11 New York, NY We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer with .NET, C#, React or Angular, Javascript and JQuery skills who will contribute and lead the application development of the product. Candidate should understand product vision and should be able to analyze requirements, design and implement enterprise level applications and follow Agile methodology in a scrum environment. S&P Global states that the anticipated base salary range for this position is $83,200 to $190,100. Base salary ranges may vary by geographic location.  In addition to base compensation, this role is eligible for an annual incentive bonus.  This role is eligible to receive additional S&P Global benefits.
